org.apache.hama.ml.perception

Class MultiLayerPerceptron

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.ml.perception.MultiLayerPerceptron
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmallMultiLayerPerceptron

    public abstract class MultiLayerPerceptron
extends Object
    PerceptronBase defines the common behavior of all the concrete perceptrons.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultiLayerPerceptron

        public MultiLayerPerceptron(double learningRate,
                    double regularization,
                    double momentum,
                    String squashingFunctionName,
                    String costFunctionName,
                    int[] layerSizeArray)
        Initialize the MLP.
        Parameters:
        learningRate - Larger learningRate makes MLP learn more aggressive. Learning rate cannot be negative.
        regularization - Regularization makes MLP less likely to overfit. The value of regularization cannot be negative or too large, otherwise it will affect the precision.
        momentum - The momentum makes the historical adjust have affect to current adjust. The weight of momentum cannot be negative.
        squashingFunctionName - The name of squashing function.
        costFunctionName - The name of the cost function.
        layerSizeArray - The number of neurons for each layer. Note that the actual size of each layer is one more than the input size.

      • MultiLayerPerceptron

        public MultiLayerPerceptron(String modelPath)
        Initialize a multi-layer perceptron with existing model.
        Parameters:
        modelPath - Location of existing model meta-data.

    • Method Detail

      • train

        public abstract void train(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dataInputPath,
         Map<String,String> trainingParams)
                    throws Exception
        Train the model with given data. This method invokes a perceptron training BSP task to train the model. It then write the model to modelPath.
        Parameters:
        dataInputPath - The path of the data.
        trainingParams - Extra parameters for training.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • output

        public DoubleVector output(DoubleVector featureVector)
        Get the output based on the input instance and the learned model.
        Parameters:
        featureVector - The feature of an instance to feed the perceptron.
        Returns:
        The results.
